title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for your vehicle's battery needs! With a peak current of 4000A and a massive 27800mAh capacity, this battery jump starter is suitable for all gas engines and up to 10L diesel engines. It features a 12V Auto Jump Box with an LED light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, and an intelligent protection system to safeguard against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is not just a jump starter, but also a 88Wh portable battery charger with versatile charging ports, including USB and Type-C. It comes with multiple LED light modes, making it perfect for outdoor and emergency situations. This rugged and portable design is suitable for cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles, and can be used up to 40 times on a full charge.

Included in the package are Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and a User Manual for your convenience. Plus, you can count on our 24-hour online after-sales support team for any assistance you may need.

Get your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter now and experience the convenience and peace of mind it brings to your vehicle maintenance!

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate battery booster power pack for all your vehicle needs. With a peak current of 4000A and a massive 27800mAh capacity, this jump starter is suitable for all gas engines and up to 10L diesel engines – making it perfect for cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. 

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter features a 12V Auto Jump Box with an LED light that has flashlight, SOS, and strobe modes, ensuring you have visibility in any situation. With USB Quick Charge 3.0 and Type C input/output, this jump starter is 75% faster than ordinary power banks, and with 40 start times on a full charge, you can rely on it time and time again.

The intelligent protection systems including protection against short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, guarantee safety and peace of mind. With two USB ports and a Type C port, you can charge multiple devices simultaneously, and the rugged design and metal clamps make it durable and reliable.

The package includes everything you need to get started, plus a 24-hour online after-sales support team for your peace of mind. Don't be left stranded with a dead battery – get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter and power up your adventures!

Featuring a 12V Auto Jump Box with LED light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, and intelligent protection systems including short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection protection, this jump starter is designed to keep you safe and get you back on the road in no time. 

With multiple charging ports including USB and Type-C, as well as a rugged and portable design, this jump starter is perfect for cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. Plus, it comes with all the accessories you need for peace of mind, including jumper cables, a USB-C cable, a cigarette lighter converter, and a carry case. 

And with 24-hour online after-sales support, you can rest assured that our team is here to help you whenever you need it. Don't get caught unprepared - get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and stay powered up on the go!
